definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

to remain calm in the face of adversity (idiom)
silicosis (occupational disease of miners)/grinder's disease/also written 矽末病

sentences.english: What is caused by the use of cosmetics after pigmentation?
sentences.chinese: 是什么原因引起化妆品使用后出现色素沉着呢？

sentences.english: He handled the gaggle of media, sponsors and fans with extraordinary aplomb .
sentences.chinese: 他处理的媒体，赞助商和球迷们以非凡的沉着鹅群。

sentences.english: Increased pigmentation of the skin is common in Addison's disease.
sentences.chinese: 增加色素沉着的皮肤是常见的艾迪生的疾病。

sentences.english: There was a self-possessed young lady connected with these accessories;
sentences.chinese: 穿戴这些衣饰的是一个沉着镇定的年轻女子。

sentences.english: The nature of modest from your personality will enable you easily get over of troubles.
sentences.chinese: 踏实稳重的性格让你在遇到困难时也能沉着应付。

sentences.english: Lung cancer and malignant mesothelioma are more common with asbestos inhalation and asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌和恶性间皮瘤亦和石绵吸入及石绵沉着病有关。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristics and postoperative results of ocular siderosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨眼铁质沉着症的临床特点及手术效果。

sentences.english: The crippled old man dragged along slowly.
sentences.chinese: 跛足老人拖着沉着的脚步缓慢地往前走。

sentences.english: Peace, my heart, let the time for the parting be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 惬意沉着荒僻默默吧，我的心，让分此外时刻甜柔吧。

sentences.english: My father stood there looming in the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲沉着脸站在走廊。

sentences.english: Watch your opponents, I calmlybouncing a ball.
sentences.chinese: 看着对手，我沉着地拍着球。

sentences.english: In dark skin, sun exposure can cause pigmentation and splotchiness.
sentences.chinese: 对于黝黑的皮肤，阳光照射会导致色素沉着。

sentences.english: The halfling before you regards you coolly.
sentences.chinese: 你面前的这个半身人沉着的注视着你。

sentences.english: O shade, so sedate and decorous by day, with calm countenance and regulated pace;
sentences.chinese: 啊，白日里那么沉着和端庄，状貌安详，步履均匀。

sentences.english: They become braver and calmer, more fluid and playful.
sentences.chinese: 他们勇敢而沉着，更显出曲线优美和顽皮。

sentences.english: Calm and steady dispassion , seldom be like today like this nervous.
sentences.chinese: 沉着冷静，很少像今天这般慌张。

cool and collected (idiom); showing no sign of nerves/perfectly composed
